data.title: Elon Oblivion
data.description: A valentines day inspired command line piece merging music by Grimes with tweets from Elon Musk.

data.title: Text-to-pizza
data.description: A communication tool that intercepts conversations and creates emoji-based advertisement pop-ups that relate to what you talked about.

data.title: Hard Ship
data.description: A space game that incorporates a custom build physical controller

data.title: Haunt that House!
data.description: A one vs many game where people play as ghosts in a browser-based world, attempt to haunt real-world physical objects in the house of the ghost hunter while avoiding being zapped out of the objects!
